Articles.Content:
Is there a way to gauge the true position of the zones that are labeled for the survey missions? Perhaps a mod or trick? The map view marker is very deceptive, you can't really tell where the center of the area is from a distance, which makes aiming you vessel in the proper direction very tricky.

Surprised this game doesn't make use of precision coordinate model, longitude and latitude.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-07T15:49:48Z" title="05/07/2015 03:49  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 7, 2015</time> by McKermack**
Have you gone to map view and clicked on the waypoint, then selected navigate to waypoint, or whatever the option is called?

> 
> [Waypoint Manager](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/104758) will do the job.

I consider this one of the "can't live without" mods. Hard to recommend it enough ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

This mod did the trick. Thank you for advice! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Thread answered.
